dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Starting work on Contained Abnormality T-01-54.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Good morning, Manager. Please share with me today's descending list of Work for the Abnormalities, and I will relay it to the team.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: It seems to me that the Clerks are having a nice lunch together. Us Control Team Agents don't particularly prefer to dine in groups... But I must wonder if that is what Ms. Malkuth would want us to do.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Work progress at 95%. We should have no trouble reaching our target PE-Box goal today. Good work.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: The 'Forsaken Murderer'? Hm. I suppose it stands out in that it does not have a particular preference for any kind of Work. It seemed that avoiding Repression Work is advisable, however.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: I foresee little trouble ahead, as long as the assigned employee has a decent understanding of this Work. A bad result, however, may lead to Abnormalities breaching containment.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: The E.G.O suits assigned to us seem adequate. However, I have been hearing reports from employees with weaker mental fortitude that it feels as though the straight-jacket is contracting around them. These suits are weak to WHITE damage, after all...

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: This E.G.O gift isn't as uncomfortable as I expected. Though it was equipped without my knowledge.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: I am curious: how does it feel when its head slowly turns into metal? Can it feel that? Does its head ring when this hammer crushes our enemies?

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: ... More banging noises, again...

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Control Team Captain, Agent Faust. Commencing suppression of the Green Dawn Ordeal as per the Manager's orders.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I am ready.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Preparing to suppress.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Do you require more Work to be done?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Containment Breach confirmed.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: The entity is weakening.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Uh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Escaped entity neutralized.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Suppression Work failed...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: That was an adequate side work.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: This Work does not align with my strengths... I will make a note of it in the logs.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: We can end the Suppression Work here. Returning to management.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Threat Suppressed. I recommend that you familiarize yourself with these alarms. Faust knows that we have many days to go before the 50th day.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Control Team's Suppression Work failed. Requesting assistance from the other departments...
